metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17095 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in mpruett Audio File Library (aka audiofile) 0.3.6, 0.3.5, 0.3.4, 0.3.3, 0.3.2, 0.3.1, 0.3.0. A heap-based buffer overflow in Expand3To4Module::run has occurred when running sfconvert.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> no fix as of 2018-09-18 ebarretto> It looks like upstream is not active anymore, some of the open CVEs have a proposed fix on a fork.

criterions.comment: audiofile: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
